channel.title: CVE Feed for Motorola -- MBTS Base Radio
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Motorola -- MBTS Base Radio

item.title: CVE-2023-23771|2024-10-02T14:01:56.047Z -- motorola -- mbts%20base%20radio
item.description: Motorola MBTS Base Radio accepts hard-coded backdoor password. The Motorola MBTS Base Radio Man Machine Interface (MMI), allowing for service technicians to diagnose and configure the device, accepts a hard-coded backdoor password that cannot be changed or disabled.
